import React from 'react'; import { useMenu } from '../contexts/MenuContext'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import styles from './DashboardPage.module.css'; const DashboardPage = () => { const { menu } = useMenu(); return (

Welcome, {menu?.restaurantName || 'Restaurant Owner'}!

This is your command center. What would you like to do today?

{/* Quick Actions Grid */}
üìù

Edit Your Menu

Add categories, update items, and set prices.

üé®

Choose a Template

Select a beautiful design for your digital menu.

üöÄ

Publish & Get QR Code

Make your menu live and download your QR code.

{/* Stats Section */}

Your Menu at a Glance

Menu Status

{menu?.isPublished ? 'Published' : 'Draft'}

Categories

{menu?.categories?.length || 0}

Total Items

{menu?.categories?.reduce((acc, cat) => acc + cat.items.length, 0) || 0}

); }; export default DashboardPage;
